text.p: The Marbledge Group Inc said Monday its reorganization plan was approved and confirmed by the United States Bankruptcy Court on February 12.
Marbledge had filed for protection under Chapter 11 of the United States Bankruptcy Code on February 2, 1996, and has operated under Chapter 11 since then.
The company said that substantial positive changes in the balance sheet will result from the reorganization due to a reduction in liabilities and an improvement in equity.

The company said it is confident that with the reorganization behind it, it will continue to expand its two product lines, fabrication and installation of granite and marble for residential and large commercial projects, and its tumbled marble product, Pietra Rustica.
